com.interface21.remoting.caucho
Class BurlapProxyFactoryBean

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.interface21.remoting.support.RemoteProxyFactoryBean
        |
        +--com.interface21.remoting.support.AuthorizableRemoteProxyFactoryBean
              |
              +--com.interface21.remoting.caucho.BurlapProxyFactoryBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
FactoryBean, InitializingBean
public class BurlapProxyFactoryBean
extends AuthorizableRemoteProxyFactoryBean

Factory bean for Burlap proxies. Behaves like the proxied service when used as bean reference, exposing the specified service interface. The service URL must be an HTTP URL exposing a Burlap service. Supports authentication via username and password.

Burlap is a slim, XML-based RPC protocol. For information on Burlap, see the Burlap website

Note: Burlap services accessed with this proxy factory do not have to be exported via BurlapServiceExporter, as there isn't any special handling involved.

Since:
13.05.2003
Author:
Juergen Hoeller
See Also:
BurlapServiceExporter
